title: Home | Scratch Foundation
text: Since 2007, kids have created and shared 1 billion projects on Scratch Scratch is way more than a coding platform to me. To me, it's a safe place to express opinions, a place where I can connect with friends, a place you can have fun, and so much more.â€” Scratcher ThatOneBandKid7564 Help ensure Scratch remains free, safe, and accessible to children everywhere.
